parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the membership that contains the ID namespace association.

parameters.name: inputReferenceConfig
parameters.description: The input reference configuration needed to create the ID namespace association. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Entity Resolution resource that is being associated to the collaboration. Valid resource ARNs are from the ID namespaces that you own. When TRUE, Clean Rooms manages permissions for the ID namespace association resource. When FALSE, the resource owner manages permissions for the ID namespace association resource.

nested_params.name: inputReferenceArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Entity Resolution resource that is being associated to the collaboration. Valid resource ARNs are from the ID namespaces that you own.

nested_params.name: manageResourcePolicies
nested_params.description: When TRUE, Clean Rooms manages permissions for the ID namespace association resource. When FALSE, the resource owner manages permissions for the ID namespace association resource.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional label that you can assign to a resource when you create it. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define. When you use tagging, you can also use tag-based access control in IAM policies to control access to this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for the ID namespace association.

parameters.name: idMappingConfig
parameters.description: The configuration settings for the ID mapping table. An indicator as to whether you can use your column as a dimension column in the ID mapping table ( TRUE) or not ( FALSE). Default is FALSE.

nested_params.name: allowUseAsDimensionColumn
nested_params.description: An indicator as to whether you can use your column as a dimension column in the ID mapping table ( TRUE) or not ( FALSE). Default is FALSE.

nested_items.name: idNamespaceAssociation
nested_items.description: The ID namespace association that was created.

nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the membership resource for this ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the collaboration that contains this ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collaboration that contains this ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of this ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the ID namespace association was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the ID namespace association was updated.

nested_items.description: The input reference configuration for the ID namespace association.

nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Entity Resolution resource that is being associated to the collaboration. Valid resource ARNs are from the ID namespaces that you own.

nested_items.name: manageResourcePolicies
nested_items.description: When TRUE, Clean Rooms manages permissions for the ID namespace association resource.

nested_items.description: The input reference properties for the ID namespace association.

nested_items.description: The ID namespace type for this ID namespace association.

nested_items.description: Defines how ID mapping workflows are supported for this ID namespace association.
